name: The Weight of Greed
description:
This puzzle-platformer game is my entry for Ludum Dare 40 game jam, the theme being "The more you have, the worse it is".

You play as old greedy man Harpagon, trying to get as many coins as possible. Be careful though, because holding too many coins might hinder you.

The game was made in 72 hours with the HaxeFlixel framework, along with Tiled to create the levels and FamiTracker to make sound effects.

Because of lack of time, the game is quite short at the moment, I plan to add content in the future.
